title: Register with valid details redirects to onboarding
description: Verifies a new user can register with valid inputs and is taken to the onboarding flow.

steps.description: Type "Test User" into the name field

title: Registration shows error for invalid email format
description: Verifies registration blocks submission and shows an email format error when email is invalid.

title: Login with valid credentials lands on swipe page
description: Verifies an existing user can log in successfully and reach the main swipe experience.

title: Login with wrong password shows authentication error
description: Verifies the app shows a visible authentication error when password is incorrect.

title: Session persists after refresh on swipe page
description: Verifies that after a successful login, refreshing the page keeps the user signed in on /swipe.

steps.description: Press Enter to refresh the page

title: Logout from settings then accessing swipe redirects to login
description: Verifies logout clears access to protected routes and protected route enforcement redirects to /login.

steps.description: Click the Settings link in the main navigation

title: Login blocks submission when email is missing
description: Verifies login requires an email and shows a visible validation message when email is blank.

title: Login blocks submission when password is missing
description: Verifies login requires a password and shows a visible validation message when password is blank.

title: Complete onboarding successfully and reach Swipe
description: Verifies a logged-in user can complete all required onboarding steps and is taken to the Swipe screen.

steps.description: Type "Test Display Name" into the display name field

title: Onboarding blocks progress when display name is empty
description: Verifies validation prevents continuing when the required display name is missing.

title: Onboarding blocks progress when birthdate is empty
description: Verifies validation prevents continuing when the required birthdate is missing.

steps.description: Type "Test Display Name" into the display name field

title: Onboarding blocks finishing when photo is missing (if photo is required)
description: Verifies the user cannot finish onboarding without a required profile photo.

steps.description: Type "Test Display Name" into the display name field

title: Entering an obviously invalid birthdate shows validation error
description: Verifies the birthdate field validates format/range and prevents progress with an invalid value.

steps.description: Type "Test Display Name" into the display name field

title: Onboarding retains entered values after a validation error
description: Verifies user inputs are preserved when a validation error occurs, reducing re-entry friction.

steps.description: Type "Persistent Name" into the display name field

title: Like a profile card advances to the next card
description: Verifies that liking the current profile card moves the feed to the next available profile card.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the main navigation

title: Pass a profile card advances to the next card
description: Verifies that passing the current profile card moves the feed to the next available profile card.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the main navigation

title: Exhaust all cards shows the no-more-cards empty state
description: Verifies that once the feed is exhausted, the UI displays an empty state indicating no more cards remain.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the main navigation
Click the "Pass" button repeatedly until no cards remain
Verify text "No more cards" is visible

title: Refresh from empty state loads new profile cards
description: Verifies that using Refresh on the empty state requests and displays new cards.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the main navigation
Click the "Pass" button repeatedly until the empty state screen is shown

title: Unlock flow reveals previously blurred likes
description: Verifies clicking Unlock/Purchase and completing the purchase flow reveals liked profiles clearly.
category: Liked Me (discovery of who liked you)

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Verify text "Complete purchase" or "Subscribe" is visible

title: Liked Me tab loads without errors and shows a stable header
description: Verifies the Liked Me tab renders its main UI elements (header/tab label) after navigation.
category: Liked Me (discovery of who liked you)

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Verify element "Liked Me list" (or the list container area) is visible

title: Empty state for Liked Me when there are no likes
description: Verifies an informative empty state is shown when there are no users who liked the current user.
category: Liked Me (discovery of who liked you)

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Verify text "No likes yet" or "Nobody has liked you yet" is visible

title: Switching between Conversations/Matches list and Liked Me keeps Liked Me accessible
description: Verifies the user can move away from Liked Me and return without the tab disappearing or breaking.
category: Liked Me (discovery of who liked you)

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Click the "Matches" or "Messages" tab (the default matches/conversations tab)

title: Non-premium user sees call-to-action to upgrade from within Liked Me
description: Verifies the Liked Me view for non-premium includes an upgrade/unlock call-to-action entry point.
category: Liked Me (discovery of who liked you)

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Verify a visible button labeled "Unlock", "Upgrade", or "Purchase" is present

title: Open Matches list and enter a match conversation
description: Verifies a logged-in user can view the matches list and open a chat thread from a match item.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Click the first match item in the matches list

title: Chat view loads correctly after selecting a match
description: Verifies selecting a match opens the chat view with expected chat UI elements visible.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Click the first match item in the matches list

title: Send a message successfully from an open chat
description: Verifies a user can type and send a message and see it appear in the chat thread.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Click the first match item in the matches list
Type "Hello from E2E test" into the message input
Verify text "Hello from E2E test" is visible

title: Prevent sending an empty chat message
description: Verifies the chat UI blocks sending a blank message and does not add a new message to the thread.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Click the first match item in the matches list
Verify text "Message cannot be empty" is visible

title: Auto-message appears in match conversation
description: Verifies that an auto-sent greeting message is present in the conversation thread for a match.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the main navigation
Click the match item that corresponds to the most recent conversation
Verify text "Selam nasÄ±l gidiyor" is visible

title: Edit and save profile text fields (bio and interests)
description: Verifies a user can edit bio/interests and see the updated details on the profile view after saving.

steps.description: Type "Updated bio for E2E test" into the Bio field
Type "Hiking, Coffee" into the Interests field
Verify text "Updated bio for E2E test" is visible

title: Avatar fallback is shown when profile has no avatar
description: Verifies the UI shows a visible fallback avatar when the user profile has no avatar image available.

title: Saving with no changes leaves details unchanged
description: Verifies that saving without making any edits does not introduce unexpected changes and still returns to the profile view.

title: Toggle notifications ON and see saved state persist on Settings
description: Verifies a user can enable notifications and the UI reflects the saved state after a reload.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation
Click the notifications toggle to turn notifications ON

title: Toggle notifications OFF and see saved state persist on Settings
description: Verifies a user can disable notifications and the UI reflects the saved state after a reload.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation
Click the notifications toggle to turn notifications OFF

title: Open privacy/account settings section and see relevant controls
description: Verifies a user can access the privacy/account section from Settings and view expected controls and information.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation

title: Logout from Settings redirects to Login
description: Verifies the user can log out from Settings and is redirected to the login page.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation

title: Initiate Delete Account and cancel in confirmation modal
description: Verifies the destructive account action shows a confirmation modal and cancel keeps the user on Settings.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation
Scroll to the account actions section

title: Confirm Delete Account and verify user is signed out to Login
description: Verifies confirming account deletion triggers the deletion flow and results in the user being signed out to the login page.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation
Scroll to the account actions section
Verify text "Are you sure" is visible

title: Close confirmation modal via close control or Escape (non-destructive)
description: Verifies the confirmation modal can be dismissed without taking action using a standard close method.

steps.description: Click the "Settings" link in the main navigation
Scroll to the account actions section
Verify text "Are you sure" is visible

title: Bottom nav: navigate to Swipe
description: Verifies the bottom navigation can take an authenticated user to the Swipe page.

steps.description: Click on the "Swipe" icon in the bottom navigation

title: Bottom nav: navigate to Matches
description: Verifies the bottom navigation can take an authenticated user to the Matches page.

steps.description: Click on the "Matches" icon in the bottom navigation

title: Bottom nav: navigate to Profile
description: Verifies the bottom navigation can take an authenticated user to the Profile page.

steps.description: Click on the "Profile" icon in the bottom navigation

title: Bottom nav persists and can move from Swipe to Matches
description: Verifies the bottom navigation is present on Swipe and can be used to navigate to Matches without direct URL navigation.

steps.description: Click on the "Swipe" icon in the bottom navigation
Click on the "Matches" icon in the bottom navigation

title: Bottom nav persists and can move from Matches to Profile
description: Verifies the bottom navigation is present on Matches and can be used to navigate to Profile without direct URL navigation.

steps.description: Click on the "Matches" icon in the bottom navigation
Click on the "Profile" icon in the bottom navigation

title: Bottom nav: navigate to Settings (main section access)
description: Verifies an authenticated user can reach Settings via bottom navigation or an equivalent primary navigation entry if present.

steps.description: Click on the "Settings" entry in the primary navigation (bottom navigation or main menu)

title: Swipe screen shows loader/skeleton during initial card load and then renders cards
description: Verifies the swipe discovery screen displays a loading state before showing swipe cards.

steps.description: Verify a loading indicator or skeleton placeholders are visible on the swipe screen

title: Swipe screen handles slow loading gracefully (loader visible before cards)
description: Verifies that on a slower load, the user still sees a clear loading state before content appears.

steps.description: Click on the "Swipe" tab or navigation item
Verify a loading indicator or skeleton placeholders are visible on the swipe screen
Wait for swipe cards to appear

title: Matches screen shows an empty state when there are no matches
description: Verifies the matches list displays an appropriate empty state instead of a blank or broken layout.

steps.description: Click on the "Matches" tab or navigation item
Verify an empty state message is visible (for example, text like "No matches" or "No conversations yet")

title: Matches screen does not show empty state when matches exist
description: Verifies that when matches exist, the matches list is visible and the empty-state messaging is not shown.

steps.description: Click on the "Matches" tab or navigation item
Verify at least one match or conversation item is visible
Verify text "No matches" is not visible

title: Non-premium account: Liked Me profiles are blurred/hidden
description: Verifies that a non-premium account sees Liked Me profiles blurred/hidden in Matches.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the primary navigation

title: Premium account: Liked Me profiles are fully visible
description: Verifies that a premium account can view Liked Me profiles without blur/locking in Matches.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the primary navigation
Verify element "Liked Me" results grid/list is visible

title: Non-premium account: Premium action (Rewind) shows upgrade prompt
description: Verifies that a non-premium account attempting Rewind is blocked and shown an upgrade/coins prompt.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the primary navigation

title: Non-premium account: Premium action (Super Like) shows upgrade prompt
description: Verifies that a non-premium account attempting Super Like is blocked and shown an upgrade/coins prompt.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the primary navigation

title: Premium account: Rewind action is available without upgrade prompt
description: Verifies that a premium account can access Rewind without being prompted to upgrade.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the primary navigation
Verify text "Get Premium" is not visible
Verify element "Swipe" card area is visible

title: Premium account: Super Like action is available without upgrade prompt
description: Verifies that a premium account can use Super Like without seeing an upgrade prompt.

steps.description: Click on "Swipe" in the primary navigation
Verify text "Get Premium" is not visible
Verify element "Swipe" card area is visible

title: Non-premium account: Liked Me tab exists but indicates locked state
description: Verifies that the Liked Me tab is present for non-premium users and clearly indicates locked/limited visibility.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the primary navigation
Verify element "Liked Me" tab is visible

title: Premium account: Liked Me tab shows content without lock messaging
description: Verifies that the premium user does not see lock/upgrade messaging while viewing Liked Me.

steps.description: Click on "Matches" in the primary navigation
